Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phylloseptin-S3 (PLS-S3; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1; XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: the waxy monkey tree frog, the painted-belly leaf frog,Phyllomedusa sauvagii, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (94.7%) toPhylloseptin-S1. Only residue 17 (I) differs from Phylloseptin-S2, where it is K.Activity: It appeared to be specifically active against Gram+ S. pyogenes ATCC 19615 (MIC 12.5 uM), but not other Gram+, Gram-, yeasts, or parasites tested therein.
Literature Information.Author: Raja Z, Andr√© S, Piesse C, Sereno D, Nicolas P, Foulon T, Oury B, Ladram Al. 2013
Literature Information.Title: Structure, antimicrobial activities and mode of interaction with membranes of novel [corrected] phylloseptins from the painted-belly leaf frog, Phyllomedusa sauvagii
